newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Femsa, Contal, Argos ratings cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Femsa, Contal, Argos ratings cut.

text.p: Grupo-Financiero Banamex-Accival said on Monday that it had lowered the ratings on three Mexican bottling companies.
- It cut the rating on bottler Sistema Argos, S.A. de C.V. (Argos) to a neutral from a buy.
- It cut Grupo Continental, S.A. (Contal) to neutral from a buy.
- It also cut Fomento Economico Mexicano (Femsa) to reduce from neutral.
- Banamex-Accival said that the fundamental perspectives for the companies had not changed, but that due to a recent run up in the price of the shares, they were changing their recommendations.
